content.headline: Ambev SA's Dividend Analysis
content.summary: Ambev SA (NYSE:ABEV) recently announced a dividend of $0.15 per share, payable on 2024-01-08, with the ex-dividend date set for 2023-12-22.  As investors look forward to this upcoming payment, the spotlight also shines on the company's dividend history, yield, and growth rates.  Using the data from GuruFocus, let's look into Ambev SAs dividend performance and assess its sustainability.
